string.text: This is the Paramedic. Come see me, there is an urgent conversation.
This is Charon. Return immediately, there is business.
Hello, this is the Paramedic. Come see me, I have business. Very urgent.
Fighter, this is Solomon. There is urgent business. Waiting for you at the transition to the Sarcophagus. Hurry.
Strelok, go forward along the road, to the northern building. Look for a blocked entrance to the catacombs by the road. When you approach, I will open the passage for you.
Strelok, this is the Count. Come see me, I have business.
Strelok, this is Fang. Come see me, I have news for you.
Strelok, this is Ghost. Come see me, regarding your things.
Thank you, Strelok. I keep my word too. Respectfully, Solomon.
You have left the Bar territory.
You are in position. Shoot only after the signal. And don't let him see you.
This is General Voronin. Stalker, help us out, bandits have attacked our base.
Well done, Strelok. You handled the chimera successfully.
Well done, Strelok. You handled the pseudogiant successfully.
Well done, Strelok. You handled the bloodsucker successfully.
This is Dan. They are on the hill: scientists slightly to the left, and military to the right. Climb onto the roof, it's easier to see from there.
In position? Wait, just in case, I don't trust these Chekhov guys. Protect the Cross.
Damn it! Are you asleep or what? They are taking ours down. The Cross... Protect the Cross.
This is the Barman. Come see me, I have business.
The process of catalyzing six ordinal Amulets into an Absolute Amulet has occurred.
That's it, we have arrived. Go talk to Leila.
Strelok, this is Borov. Mercenaries have attacked the Bar's southern checkpoint. Help out, I know you are somewhere nearby!
rub. has been credited to your account.\n Total deposit amount
rub. has been withdrawn from your deposit.\n Balance on account
rub.\n Balance on account is zero rub.\n Watch out so you don't get robbed on the way...
Stalker, the bet didn't play.\n Come another time
Stalker, your bet played.\n You won
Stalker, the bet didn't play.\n And the sum of your debt has grown to
\n I'll gift you a rope and soap for a Jellyfish artifact.
Stalker, this time you got lucky.\n You won
\n But you have a small debt of
, which I will deduct immediately.\n So your winning is only
\n but you owe exactly the same amount, which I'm taking immediately.\n So there is nothing for you to receive
\n But don't rush to rejoice, I'm taking the whole sum, and you - still owe
\n So go... well, you understood where
Stalker, the deposit amount grew to
Specify the number of hours to sleep
You have killed more than 300 inhabitants of the Zone. Damage to stalkers increased.
More than 500 people have died at your hands. Damage to stalkers increased.
You have cleared the Zone of more than 500 monsters. Damage to monsters increased.
You have rid the Zone of more than 1000 monsters. Damage to monsters increased.
You have used all available medical supplies on yourself. Effectiveness of medical preparations increased.
For active use of all sorts of injectors. Effectiveness of injectors reduced.
For eating a large amount of food. Food satisfies hunger more effectively.
You have slept for more than a month. Need for sleep reduced.
You have survived 5 Blowouts. Impact of the blowout reduced.
For cooking more than 100 artifacts. Chance of artifact degeneration increased.
For butchering more than 100 monsters. Monster butchering speed is faster.
You have drunk more than 40 bottles of vodka. Intoxication reduced.
